org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.item

Interface ItemScoreAlgorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultItemScoreAlgorithm

    @DefaultImplementation(value=DefaultItemScoreAlgorithm.class)
public interface ItemScoreAlgorithm

    Algorithm for scoring items given an item-item model and neighborhood scorer. Used by ItemItemScorer and ItemItemGlobalScorer to score items. This logic is mainly abstracted so that the personalized and global item scorers can share logic; it isn’t very common to reimplement this component.

    Since:
    0.10

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void scoreItems(ItemItemModel model, SparseVector userData, MutableSparseVector scores, NeighborhoodScorer scorer)
      Score items for a user.

    • Method Detail

      • scoreItems

        void scoreItems(ItemItemModel model,
              SparseVector userData,
              MutableSparseVector scores,
              NeighborhoodScorer scorer)

        Score items for a user.

        Parameters:
        model - The item-item model.
        userData - The user’s rating data.
        scores - The score vector (key domain is items to score). Unscoreable items will be left unchanged.
        scorer - The scorer to use.
